channel.title: Can't view my pages on 000Webhost
channel.description: I made a website, just to test out some files I made, but for some reason, whenever I try and go to one of my pages, it takes me to some error page and says to sign up for 000webhost. I can't view any of my pages because when ever I try to load a page, it just opens http://error.000webhost.com and I'm getting really annoyed. I need help

item.title: Can't view my pages on 000Webhost
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

name your home page index.html

Read full topic

item.title: Can't view my pages on 000Webhost
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Well, I’ve uploaded the file to no directory meaning it goes like http://website.com/page.html but it still brings me to an error. Then, I put the file in to the directory called “public_html” and I still got sent to the error page. What do you suggest I do then?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 24, 2009, 10:43:26 pm[/size][hr]Hmmm??

Read full topic

item.title: Can't view my pages on 000Webhost
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

because it can’t find the page/file you’re trying to view on that website
